author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...EXTREMELY DANGEROUS CATEGORY 5 MELISSA CROSSING WESTERN JAMAICA... ...CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLASH FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE OCCURRING ON THE ISLAND...
summary: ...EXTREMELY DANGEROUS CATEGORY 5 MELISSA CROSSING WESTERN JAMAICA... ...CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLASH FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE OCCURRING ON THE ISLAND... As of 2:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 18.2, -78.0 with movement NNE at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 899 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 165 mph.

As of 2:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 18.2, -78.0 with movement NNE at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 899 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 165 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
